name: scruffy gets a glass of milk at 4:25am simulator
name_original: scruffy gets a glass of milk at 4:25am simulator
description: this was supposed to be completed a day before plum was gonna be fully revealed but due to lack of motivation and other stuff it was finished way later so thats why theres a guess design of the character and why there called floss in the files, anyway enjoy this dumb little fan game. horrorvale and the sprites from it belong to batworks software and go play the act 1 demo its actually good especially play it if your just stumbling into this i just wanted a better archive of this to be put up.
